instructions: These instructions are not used in any way other than to serve the user of this file.
Everything under prompts should be entered according to Yeoman standards.
Refer to the documentation for Inquirer.js for instructions on how to create these prompts: https://github.com/SBoudrias/Inquirer.js
The value of the 'name' variable for each prompt will be used in the templates setup.
To use the templates, see ./generators/templates. For instructions on how to use the templates, see: http://ejs.co.

prompts.name: version
prompts.message: What is your projects' version number?

prompts.name: theme_folder
prompts.message: What do you want to call the theme folder? (Only valid folder names please.)

prompts.name: langcode_iso
prompts.message: What is the ISO language code for your project? (To be used for the HTML lang attribute, e.g.: 'nl' or 'en'.

prompts.name: db_hostname
prompts.message: What is the hostname of the WordPress database?

prompts.name: db_name
prompts.message: What is the name of the WordPress database? (DB name, not username)

prompts.name: db_username
prompts.message: What is the username of the WordPress database? (not DB name, username)

prompts.name: db_password
prompts.message: What is the password of the WordPress database?

prompts.name: db_charset
prompts.message: What is the character set used for this DB? (Usually utf8)

prompts.name: npm
prompts.message: Which of these NPM modules would you like to include?
